code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./Sidebar.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Sidebar(_ref){let{selectedRepo,setSelectedRepo}=_ref;const[repos,setRepos]=useState([]);const handleCloneRepo=async()=>{const response=await fetch("/repos");const repoList=await response.json();const repoUrl=prompt("Enter the repository URL to clone:");if(!repoUrl)return;await fetch("/embed",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({repo_url:repoUrl})});setRepos([...repos,repoUrl.split("/").pop()]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Repositories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:repos.map((repo,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:selectedRepo===repo?"selected":"",onClick:()=>setSelectedRepo(repo),children:repo},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"clone-btn",onClick:handleCloneRepo,children:"Clone Repo"})]});}export default Sidebar;
